test_cases.label: Scenario 1: Filter out events/trips by trip version, release stage, label source, and coaching state.
Scenario 3: Harsh event and Total event count use right labels and only automatic labels
Scenario 4: Combine rows of the same object id and type during the same times in the final counts and time durations.
Scenario 5: Combine rows of the same object id and type during the same times in the total event counts.
Scenario 6: Combines model versions from both automatic and manual labels
Scenario 7: Camera-equipped vehicle metrics are correctly aggregated
